select b.aboardNo as boardNo ,b.aboardval as meetCate ,a.clubId as clubId , case when aboardval = 2 then '[결제]' when aboardval = 3 then '[일정]' end as frontTitle ,b.title as title ,TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate ,TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate from meet_name a join aboard b on a.meetNo = b.meetNo where a.clubID = #{clubId} and meetyear in #{years} and meetmon = #{month}
and b.aboardVal = 2
and b.aboardVal in (2,3)
and b.aboardVal = 3

SELECT myScheduleNo AS perScheduleNo ,schetitle AS title ,myScheduleNo as perScheNo ,scheContent AS content ,TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate ,TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate ,schePlace AS place ,address1 ,address2 FROM my_schedule WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND ((EXTRACT(MONTH FROM startDate) = #{month} and extract(year from startDate) = #{years}) or (extract(month from endDate) = #{month} and extract (year from endDate) = #{years}))

select myscheduleNo as perScheNo ,memberId ,TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate ,TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate , scheTitle as title , scheContent as content ,schePlace as place ,address1 ,address2 from my_schedule where myscheduleNo = #{perScheNo}
